title: Poster, ca. 1965
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Right side along edge: Entwuft: A. Hofmann/ Druck: Wassermann AG
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: The upper third of the poster design consists of vertical black strips of varigated width ending in a step-like progression below.  The lower portion of the design consists of a photographic image of the bass section of an orchestra, taken from above. The high contrast resolution of the photograph highlights the music stands and instruments while the dark suits of the musicians merge with the black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1965.
ca. 1965. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-147.
